messages.content: Update band ahe ya polt chey
messages.standalone_question: What is the update on the band?
messages.standalone_en: What is the update on the band?

messages.content:
तुमच्या सर्व प्लॉट्समध्ये सध्या "गडद" अवस्थेत आहेत. तुम्ही "जंबो प्लॉट 1", "जंबो प्लॉट 2", "किंग बेरी" आणि "जंबो प्लॉट 3" यामध्ये "सबसकेन" आणि "कॅन मॅच्युरिटी" या अवस्थेत आहात. 

तुमच्या "जंबो प्लॉट 3" मध्ये "हार्वेस्ट" अवस्थेत आहात, परंतु तुम्ही 9 दिवसांपेक्षा जास्त काळ या अवस्थेत आहात. कृपया तुमच्या प्लॉटची अवस्था अॅपवर अपडेट करा. 

तुम्हाला आणखी काही मदतीची आवश्यकता आहे का?
messages.en:
All of your plots are currently in a "dark" state. You're in the "subscale" and "can maturity" stages in "Jumbo Plot 1," "Jumbo Plot 2," "King Berry" and "Jumbo Plot 3." 

You're in the "harvest" phase in your "jumbo plot 3," but you've been in this state for more than 9 days. Please update the status of your plot on the app. 

Do you need any more help?

messages.content: Kingberry ya plot chey update yet nahiy
messages.en: Kingberry ya plot chey update yet nahiy
messages.standalone_question: Is there an update for the King Berry plot?
messages.standalone_en: Is there an update for the King Berry plot?

messages.content:
"King Berry" प्लॉटमध्ये सध्या "कॅन मॅच्युरिटी" अवस्था आहे, जी 2025-06-16 पासून सुरू झाली आहे. तुम्ही या अवस्थेत आहात आणि तुम्हाला अद्यतनाची आवश्यकता आहे.

कृपया तुमच्या प्लॉटची अवस्था अॅपवर अपडेट करा. तुम्हाला आणखी काही मदतीची आवश्यकता आहे का?
messages.en:
The "King Berry" plot currently has a "can maturity" phase, which started on 2025-06-16. You're in this state and you need an update.

Please update the status of your plot on the app. Do you need any more help?

messages.content: Kem upadet nai thatu mara plot ma
messages.en: Kem upadet nai thatu mara plen ma
messages.standalone_question: Why haven't you updated the plot?
messages.standalone_en: Why haven't you updated the plot?

messages.content:
Tame je plot ma pomegranate ugadta cho, te "Plot 1(Pomo)" che. A plot ma "Mid stage fruit growth" chalu che, je 10 June 2025 thi sharu thayo. 

Aapne aapna crop na agal na stages ni mahiti aapishu:

1. **Mid stage fruit growth** (Chalu stage)
2. **Late stage fruit growth and Harvest** (Aagal ni stage)
3. **Rest**
4. **One month before stress**
5. **Stress**

Aapne koi vishesh madad joiye che?
messages.en:
The plot in which you grow pomagrainet is "Plot 1(Pomo)". The plot continues "Mid Stage Fruit Growth", which started on June 10, 2025. 

Let's give you information about the next stage of your crop:

1. **Mid Stage Fruit Growth** (Ongoing Stage)
2. **Late Stage Fruit Growth and Harvest** (Next Stage)
3. **Rest**
4. **One Month Before Stress**
5. **Stress**

Do you want any special help?

messages.standalone_question: Do you need any specific assistance?
messages.standalone_en: Do you need any specific assistance?

messages.content: Tame koi vishesh madad joiye che? Aapne aapna plot ma koi samasya che ke koi vishay ma jankari joiye che?
messages.en: Do you want any special help? Do you have a problem in your plot or do you want information on a subject?

messages.content: tell me yesterday's rainfall for all the division except Nero make it all in table format and add average also
messages.en: tell me yesterday's rainfall for all the division except Nero make it all in table format and add average also
messages.standalone_question: What was yesterday's rainfall for all divisions except Nero, presented in table format with the average included?
messages.standalone_en: What was yesterday's rainfall for all divisions except Nero, presented in table format with the average included?

messages.content:
Here is the rainfall data for yesterday (June 16, 2025) for the divisions excluding Nero:

| Plot Name               | Rainfall (mm) |
|------------------------|----------------|
| Srock Attamala         | 99             |
| Srock Chooralmala Kairo| 101            |
| Srock Mundakkai Kairo  | 179            |
| Srock Puthumala        | 126            |
| **Average**            | **126.25**     |

The average rainfall across these divisions was 126.25 mm.
messages.en:
Here is the rainfall data for yesterday (June 16, 2025) for the divisions excluding Nero:

| Plot Name               | Rainfall (mm) |
|------------------------|----------------|
| Srock Attamala         | 99             |
| Srock Chooralmala Kairo| 101            |
| Srock Mundakkai Kairo  | 179            |
| Srock Puthumala        | 126            |
| **Average**            | **126.25**     |

The average rainfall across these divisions was 126.25 mm.
